title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE, HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO AND SIGN A TRIPARTITE MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) WITH THE SANGGUNIANG BARANGAY OF MAYONDON AND UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES (UPLB) FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE BARANGAY INTEGRATED DEVELOPMENT APPROACH FOR NUTRITION IMPROVEMENT (BIDANI)
